A.CNTPLC_SEQ /*연락처일련번호 */ , A.ITG_CUST_NO /*통합고객번호 */ , A.CNTPLC_TYPE_CD /*연락처유형코드 공통코드 : CU300 [001 : 설치장소 , 002 : 직장 , 003 : 자택 , 004 : 휴대전화]*/ , A.REP_CNTPLC_YN /*대표연락처여부 */ , A.TEL_BK_DGT_NO /*전화뒤자리번호 */ , A.DISTRCT_CD , A.ZIP_CD /*우편번호 */ , A.ADDR_1_CTNTS /*주소1내용 */ , A.DEL_YN /*삭제여부 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , TO_CHAR(A.AMD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.REG_CHL_CD /*등록채널코드 공통코드 : S000 [CRM : CRM , CTC : 상담 , AS : AS , SAP : SAP]*/ , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD = A.REG_CHL_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) REG_CHL_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU300' AND COMN_CD = A.CNTPLC_TYPE_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) CNTPLC_TYPE_CD_NM , (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU100' AND COMN_CD = A.DISTRCT_CD AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2) DISTRCT_CD_NM , (SELECT CUST_NM FROM CRM_CUST_BAS WHERE ITG_CUST_NO = A.ITG_CUST_NO) CUST_NM , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',A.EMAIL_ADDR,'') EMAIL_ADDR /*이메일주소 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',A.TEL_NO,'') TEL_NO /*전화번호 */ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',A.ADDR_2_CTNTS,'') ADDR_2_CTNTS /*주소2내용 */

SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmCustCntplcBasDao.selectList */ FROM CRM_CUST_CNTPLC_BAS A
ORDER BY REP_CNTPLC_YN DESC , CNTPLC_TYPE_CD , REG_DT DESC

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmCustCntplcBasDao.selectLastList */ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.ITG_CUST_NO, A.CNTPLC_TYPE_CD ORDER BY A.AMD_DT DESC, A.REG_DT DESC) RNUM FROM CRM_CUST_CNTPLC_BAS A WHERE A.ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} ) A WHERE RNUM = 1 ORDER BY A.CNTPLC_TYPE_CD

WHERE ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
